config.installCommand: npm install && git clone -b 3.16.0 https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git /tmp/flutter && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter precache && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter doctor
config.buildCommand: npm run build && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter build web --web-renderer html --base-href / && cp -r build/web/* .next/static/
